column3:
“Definitely does as expected. Helped with stress and anxiety. Very euphoric and creates creativity. Liked it so much, I went back the next day and picked up plenty.
Stoned is the way of the walk"”"

“Very fascinating fruity sativa. Immediately you’re struck with a strawberry and hint of fermented cherries on the smell. Taste is mainly strawberry and and a cherry Kush vaguely sour sweet kinda thing. 
The high for me is psychedelic and energizing while retaining some introspection. I feel that there is something slightly missing, something a little ‘empty’ in the high, this is a personal preference for me and I sti...”

“Super Lemon Haze x Sour Strawberry
What caught my eye was the red tones in the bud some pink too,
medium sized buds, a slight strawberry flavor, tho I was looking for more strawberry this was ok as flavor goes”
“It’s got a great taste and smokes good to.it really helped me out with anxiety and not wanting to go out.”

“Excellent sativa for staying active.  I avoid smoking THC in the morning because I’m not that productive if I do.  When I first tried Strawberry Blonde I was impressed by the uplifting effects that stayed for a long period of time.  At the end of the high I typically feel way too relaxed (even with sativas), but Strawberry Blonde made me feel a clarity that no other strain ever had.  Default strain for active hours �...”
